# CTRadioAccessTechnologyDidChange

**Type Property**

The name of the notification indicating that the radio access technology changed for one of the services.

## Declaration

```swift
static let CTRadioAccessTechnologyDidChange: NSNotification.Name
```

## Discussion

The notification’s [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSNotification/object] is an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSString] that represents the service identifier of the service whose radio access technology has changed. Use this string as the key in [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreTelephony/CTTelephonyNetworkInfo/serviceCurrentRadioAccessTechnology] to get the value of the new radio access technology for the service.

## Core Telephony

- **CTServiceRadioAccessTechnologyDidChange**: A notification that posts when radio access technology changes.
